channel.title: Google Dorking Resources
channel.description:
https://www.exploit-db.com/google-hacking-database/?action=search&ghdb_search_cat_id=9&ghdb_search_text=
I am sure most of you know what exploit-db is, but this is a collection of google dorks that are uploaded there. One of the more interesting ones searches sites like pastebin for email leaks.
I might start some tuts on google hacking but for now I am 1100100% occupied with creating a directory of resources.
